children.name: Introduction
Feedback Request

blocks.text: If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.

children.name: Investigate your Payment Term

blocks.text: This dashboard provides an overview and details on the Payment Terms. Payment Term serves as an agreement between seller and buyer and the expectation for the buyer to pay the seller based on agreed conditions.
Payment Terms are defined in three places according to SAP Data:  Invoices, Purchase Orders and Invoice Vendor Master Data.
The following use cases are considered in this analysis:
Invoices with Immediate Payment Term analysis
Payment Term better in Invoices than in PO or Vendor Master Data
Payment Term changes deep dive

Structure of the Dashboard
  Page 1 - Overview: Leading KPIs, a Process Discovery Widget and a Business Case Calculator 
  Page 2 - Impact: Overview of all Payment Terms in the current data set and their impact on your Invoice-to-Pay process
  Page 3 - Root Cause Analysis: Deep Dive into possible blockers causing late payments
  Page 4 - Take Action: A collection of ideas to tackle the drivers of inefficiencies
  Page 5 - Case Details: An exportable list of single Invoices and their most important attributes that can be filtered.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

children.name: Additional Dashboards Available

blocks.text: For a more detailed analysis of key process areas, see other available dashboards.
Cycle Time Analysis

children.name: Overview
Process Discovery
Number of Invoices
children.description: Total number of all Invoices

children.name: Number of Invoices with immediate PT
children.description: Number of Invoices with immediate Payment Terms

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Invoices with immediate PT
children.description: Percentage of Invoices with immediate Payment compared to the total.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 

COUNT(case_id) FILTER ( WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0)
/COUNT(case_id) * 100

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Invoice Value with Immediate PT
children.description: Amount (USD) of Invoices with immediate Payment Terms

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Immediate WC Impact
children.description: Invoice amount (USD) which had to be spend due to immediate PT although PO has better conditions. Default interest rate set at 4%

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM(("Inv. Converted USD Amount")*("Last PO Cash Discount Days 1")*0.04/365) AS "$ of WC impact"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE ("Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0

children.name: Number of Invoices with better PT than in Vendor Master data
children.description: Number of Invoices with better Payment Terms than defined in Vendor Master Data

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") > 
    	  ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1") OR 
          ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2") > 
    	  ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2") OR 
          ("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period") >
          ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD"))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Invoices with better PT than Vendor Master Data
children.description: Percentages of Invoices with less Discount Days or better Net Payment Term Period than in Vendor Master Data. Number is compared to the total

dataSource.query:
SELECT 

COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") > 
    	  ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1") OR 
          ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2") > 
    	  ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2") OR 
          ("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period") >
          ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD"))
/COUNT(case_id) * 100

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Invoice Value with better PT than in Vendor Master Data
children.description: Value (USD) of Invoices with its PT better than Vendor Master Data

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER(
		WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") > 
    	  ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1") OR 
          ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2") >
    	  ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2") OR 
          ("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period") >
          ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD"))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Invoices with updated PO PT
children.description: Number of Invoices where Payment Terms (PT) in PO have been updated

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (ILIKE 'Update PO Payment Terms'))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Invoices with PT Changes
children.description: Percentage of Invoices with Payment Term changes either in PO or Invoice. Number is compared to the total number of Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
WHERE "Change Type" MATCHES ( 'Update' )
	-- get all "changes"
	AND ("Changed Table" MATCHES ('EKKO') OR 
	"Changed Table" MATCHES ('BSEG'))
	AND ( "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZTERM')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1P')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2P')
)
)/ COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Rate (%) of Invoices with immediate payment terms"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Invoices with PT Changes
children.description: Number of Invoices with Payment Term Changes either in PO or Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
WHERE "Change Type" MATCHES ( 'Update' )
	-- get all "changes"
	AND ("Changed Table" MATCHES ('EKKO') OR 
	"Changed Table" MATCHES ('BSEG'))
	AND ( "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZTERM')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1P')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2P')
))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Invoice Value with PT Changes
children.description: Value (USD) of invoices with Payment Term Changes either in Invoice or in PO

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
WHERE "Change Type" MATCHES ( 'Update' )
	-- get all "changes"
	AND ("Changed Table" MATCHES ('EKKO') OR 
	"Changed Table" MATCHES ('BSEG'))
	AND ( "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZTERM')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1P')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2P')
))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Impact
Immediate Payment Term Analysis

blocks.text: Definition:

Immediate Payment Term is when Payable are immediately due. 
Affected columns and condition:  "Last inv. item cash discount days 1" = 0 or NULL :

Invoices with immediate Payment Term but not on PO.
Affected columns and condition:  "Last PO cash discount days 1" != 0 AND  "Last inv. item cash discount days 1" = 0

children.name: Number of Invoices with immediate PT
children.description: Number of Invoices with immediate Payment Term

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Invoices with immediate PT
children.description: Share of Invoices with immediate PT compared to the total of all Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT 

COUNT(case_id) FILTER ( WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0)
/COUNT(case_id) * 100

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Immediate PT Invoices by Company Code
children.description: Number of Invoices and Invoice Amount with immediate Payment by Company Code

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")FILTER 
(WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) AS "Invoice Value in $",
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER 
(WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) AS "Number of Invoices with immediate payment terms",
"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
--WHERE "Inv. Company Code Text" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: Rate of Immediate Invoices over time
children.description: Share of Invoices with immediate Payment Terms out of all Invoices posted

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME)FILTER(
		WHERE event_name IN ('Post Invoice')) AS "Month")) AS "Invoice posting date", 
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0)/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Rate (%) of Invoices with immediate payment terms"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: Rate of Invoice with better PT than Vendor Master Data
children.description: Share of invoices with better Payment Terms defined than in the Master Data of the Vendor. Better means hereby a longer period of payment.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 

COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") > 
    	  ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1") OR 
          ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2") > 
    	  ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2") OR 
          ("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period") >
          ("Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD"))
/COUNT(case_id) * 100

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Invoices with PT Changes
children.description: Percentage of Invoices with Payment Term changes either in PO or Invoice compared to the total number of Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
WHERE "Change Type" MATCHES ( 'Update' )
	-- get all "changes"
	AND ("Changed Table" MATCHES ('EKKO') OR 
	"Changed Table" MATCHES ('BSEG'))
	AND ( "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZTERM')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1P')

children.name: Payment Term Changes Analysis

blocks.text: Definition: Analysis of Payment Term Changes on Invoice or PO to observe the potential impact caused by it by filtering its Change Type, Changed Table and Changed Field
"Change Type" = 'Update' ,
"Changed Table" = 'EKKO', 'BSEG',
"Changed Field"  = ZTERM', 'ZTERM', 'ZBD1T','ZBD2T','ZBD3T', 'ZBD1P', 'ZBD2P'

children.name: Number of Invoices with Changes grouped by Company Code (Top 10)
children.description: Invoices with Changes in Payment Terms (either in Invoice or PO) sorted by number of Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) AS "Number of Invoices", "Inv. Company Code" as "Company code"
FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
WHERE "Change Type" = 'Update' -- get all "changes"
AND ("Changed Table" IN ('EKKO','BSEG'))
AND ("Changed Field" IN  ('ZTERM', 'ZTERM', 'ZBD1T','ZBD2T','ZBD3T', 'ZBD1P', 'ZBD2P'))
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Rate of Invoices with PT Changes
children.description: Percentage of Invoices with changes in Payment Terms (either in PO or Invoice) out of all Invoices posted

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME)FILTER(
		WHERE event_name IN ('Post Invoice')) AS "Month")) AS "Invoice posting date", 
COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
WHERE "Change Type" MATCHES ( 'Update' )-- get all "changes"
AND ("Changed Table" MATCHES ('EKKO') OR 
"Changed Table" MATCHES ('BSEG'))
AND ( "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZTERM')
OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1T')
OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2T')
OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1P')
OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2P')
)
)/ COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Rate (%) of Invoices with immediate payment terms"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: Number of Invoices with Changes by Vendor Country
children.description: Invoices with changes in Payment Terms (either in Invoice or PO), grouped by Vendor Country and sorted by the number of Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) AS "Number of Invoices", 
"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country"  AS "Vendor Country"
FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
WHERE "Change Type" = 'Update' -- get all "changes"
AND ("Changed Table" IN ('EKKO','BSEG'))
AND ("Changed Field" IN  ('ZTERM', 'ZTERM', 'ZBD1T','ZBD2T','ZBD3T', 'ZBD1P', 'ZBD2P'))
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Number of Invoices with Changes by Vendor  (Top 10)
children.description: Invoices with changes in Payment Terms (either in Invoice or PO), grouped by Vendor and sorted by the number of Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) AS "Number of Invoices", 
"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
WHERE "Change Type" = 'Update' -- get all "changes"
AND ("Changed Table" IN ('EKKO','BSEG'))
AND ("Changed Field" IN  ('ZTERM', 'ZTERM', 'ZBD1T','ZBD2T','ZBD3T', 'ZBD1P', 'ZBD2P'))
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Compare Payment Term between Invoices and Vendor Master Data

blocks.text: Definition: Shorter Payment Terms than defined in Vendor Master Data on Company Code Level
1. "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" <  "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
2. "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2"  <  "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2"
3.  "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" <  "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD"

children.name: Number and Value of Invoices with Shorter PT than Vendor Master Data (grouped by Vendor)
children.description: Overview of Invoices with shorter Payment Terms by their Invoice Value and number, grouped by Vendor

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") 
		AS "Invoice Amount in $",
	COUNT(case_id)
    	AS "Number Of Invoices with Shorter Payment Terms on Vendor MD",
	"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
    

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE (("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1" END)
   	 	OR 
     	("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" END))
        OR
		("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" END)))	
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: Number of Invoices with Shorter Payment Terms Over Time
children.description: Overview of invoices with shorter payment terms than defined in Vendor Master Data

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME)FILTER(
		WHERE event_name IN ('Post Invoice')) AS "Month")) AS "Invoice posting date", 
		COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "Value of Invoices with Shorter PT"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS

WHERE (("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1" END)
   	 	OR 
     	("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" END))
        OR
		("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" END)))
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: Number of Invoices with PT Changes
children.description: This widgets reflects the number of Invoices with Payment Term Changes on either Invoice or PO level

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
WHERE "Change Type" MATCHES ( 'Update' )
	-- get all "changes"
	AND ("Changed Table" MATCHES ('EKKO') OR 
	"Changed Table" MATCHES ('BSEG'))
	AND ( "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZTERM')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1P')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2P')
))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Invoices with changes in PO PT after posting Invoice
children.description: Updating PO Payment terms after the Invoice get posted is an undesired behaviour. This widget calculates how many Invoices are affected

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice' ~> 'Update PO Payment Terms')

children.name: Number of Invoices with shorter PT than in Vendor Master Data
children.description: Number of Invoices with shorter Payment Period than defined in Vendor Master Data

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
WHERE (("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
   	 	OR 
     	("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" END))
        OR
		("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" END))))
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Invoices with shorter PT than in Vendor Master Data
children.description: Share of Invoices with shorter days for Payment than defined in Vendor Master Data

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
WHERE (("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
   	 	OR 
     	("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" END))
        OR
		("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" END))))
 /COUNT(case_id) * 100
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Invoice Value with shorter PT than in Vendor Master Data
children.description: Invoice Value (USD) of Invoices with shorter Payment Terms than in Vendor Master Data

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount" ) FILTER(
WHERE (("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
   	 	OR 
     	("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" END))
        OR
		("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" END))))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Root Cause Analysis
Compare Payment Term on Invoice & PO

blocks.text: At below Table in column "Immediate PT Behaviour", the Payment Term of each Vendor it is defined by 5 categories to see if any mis-match behaviour on immediate Payment Term listed differently on Purchase Order, Invoice, Vendor Master data.
The respective count of Invoices and amount is calculated as follows:
'Immediate PT in Master Data' : WHEN "Last PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
'Immediate PT on PO': WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
'Immediate PT on Invoice but not on PO' : WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
'Immediate PT on PO but not on Invoice' : WHEN "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
'ok': All the others

children.name: Immediate PT between PO, Invoice and MD per Vendor
children.description: The table focuses on checks of immediate Payment Terms on PO, Invoice and Master Data (Company Code level) for Vendors

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Inv. Company Code" AS "Company Code"
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,CASE 
	WHEN "Last PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT in Master Data'
	WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on PO'
    WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on Invoice but not on PO'
    WHEN "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on PO but not on Invoice'
 ELSE 'ok'
 END AS "Immediate PT Behaviour"
,COUNT(case_id) -- FILTER(WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Number of Invoices"  
,SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") -- FILTER(WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Invoice Amounts" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5
ORDER BY 3 desc

children.name: Root Cause Analysis

blocks.text: This page provides a deep dive into four different scenarios of Payment Term differences
Immediate Payment Term comparison on Invoice and Purchase Order
Most recent invoice payment term vs. Vendor Master Payment Terms
Invoices with shorter payment terms than Vendor Master Data
Invoices with payment term changes on either Invoice or PO

children.name: Most recent Payment Term details on the last Invoice of the Vendor
children.description: Comparison of the most recent (LAST) Invoice Payment Term with Vendor Master Data (Company Code Level)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
"Inv. Company Code" AS "Company Code"
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,LAST("Inv. Accounting Document Date") AS "Last Inv. Accounting Document Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" <> "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms"
ORDER BY 4 DESC

children.name: Invoices with Payment Term Changes on either Invoice or PO
children.description: This table includes all Payment Term changes on either Invoice or PO

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
case_id, 
"end_time" 
--,"Changed Table"
, CASE
	WHEN "Changed Table" = 'EKKO' THEN 'Purchasing Document Header'
    WHEN "Changed Table" = 'BSEG' THEN 'Accounting Document Segment'
    ELSE 'Others'
    END AS "Changed Table"
, CASE
	WHEN "Changed Field" = 'ZBD1P' THEN 'Cash Discount Percentage 1'
    WHEN "Changed Field" = 'ZBD2P' THEN 'Cash Discount Percentage 2'
    WHEN "Changed Field" = 'ZBD1T' THEN 'Cash discount days 1'
    WHEN "Changed Field" = 'ZBD2T' THEN 'Cash discount days 2'
    WHEN "Changed Field" = 'ZBD3T' THEN 'Net Payment Terms Period'
    WHEN "Changed Field" = 'ZTERM' THEN 'Terms of Payment Key'
    ELSE 'Others'
	END AS "Changed Field"
,"Change Old Value"
,"Change New Value"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE ("Changed Table" IN ('EKKO','BSEG'))
AND ("Changed Field" IN  ('ZTERM', 'ZTERM', 'ZBD1T','ZBD2T','ZBD3T', 'ZBD1P', 'ZBD2P'))

children.name: Invoices with Shorter PT than Vendor Master Data (aggregated)
children.description: This table shows an aggregated overview of Invoices with shorter Payment Terms than defined in Vendor Master Data (Company Code Level)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
	"Inv. Company Code" AS "Company Code",
	"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code Name",
	"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number",
	"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name",
	CASE
		WHEN "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" <> "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms" THEN 'Payment Term Missmatch'
		WHEN "Max_Days_Invoice" < "Max_Days_MD" THEN 'Shorter Payment Period on Invoice than in MD'
		WHEN "Max_Days_Invoice" > "Max_Days_MD" THEN 'Longer Payment Period on Invoice than in MD'
		WHEN "Max_Days_Invoice" = "Max_Days_MD" THEN 'Net Due Dates ok but wrong Payment Term'
		ELSE 'Payment Terms are aligned'
	END AS "Payment Term Comparison",
	COUNT(case_id) AS "No. of Invoices with Shorter Payment Terms", 
	"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" AS "Terms of Payment Key on Invoice",
	"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms" AS "Terms of Payment Key on Vendor Master",
	"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" AS "Cash Discount Days 1 on Invoice",
	"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1" AS "Cash Discount Days 1 on Vendor Master Data",
	"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" AS "Cash Discount Days 2 on Invoice",
	"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" AS "Cash Discount Days 2 on Vendor Master Data",
	"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" AS "Net Payment Terms Period on Invoice",
	"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" AS "Net Payment Terms Period on Vendor Master Data"
FROM
	(
		SELECT
			"Inv. Company Code",
			"Inv. Company Code Text",
			"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number",
			"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name",
			case_id,
			"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1",
			"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1",
			"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2",
			"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2",
			"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period",
			"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD",
			CASE 
				WHEN "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" IS NULL THEN 'N/A' ELSE "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" 
				END AS "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" ,
			CASE 
				WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms" IS NULL THEN 'N/A' ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms" 
				END AS "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms",
			CASE
				WHEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" IS NOT NULL THEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
				WHEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" IS NULL
				AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" IS NOT NULL THEN "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2"
				WHEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" IS NULL
				AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" IS NULL THEN "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1"
			END AS "Max_Days_Invoice",
			CASE
				WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NOT NULL THEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
				WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL
				AND "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NOT NULL THEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2"
				WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL
				AND "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL THEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
			END AS "Max_Days_MD"
		FROM
			THIS_PROCESS
	) AS "Selection"
WHERE
	(
		("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") < "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
		OR (
			"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" < (
				CASE
					WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL THEN 0
					ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2"
				END
			)
		)
		OR (
			"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" < (
				CASE
					WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL THEN 0
					ELSE "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
				END
			)
		)
	)
ORDER BY
	6 DESC

children.name: Take Action
Take Action

blocks.text: Please adjust numbers to your business case to analyze the impact. You can start using the Business Case Calculator below.

children.name: Business Case Calculator
children.description: This business case calculation serves as a simplified example and focus on the calculation of the impact on productivity or throughput in case of changes or order delays

children.name: Suggestions to reduce/avoid issues caused by Payment Term Changes include:

blocks.text: Improve Payment conditions by:
Revisit your Master Data to make sure they're up to date
Review regularly (quarterly/monthly)  Payment Term differences between PT on Invoice, PO and Vendor Master Data
Review with special focus on the latest Invoice per vendor
Avoid changing of Payment Term after the Invoice is posted
Review immediate PT Invoices to try to negotiate with supplier for better payment terms if possible
Additional check of Master Data Payment Terms defined by different Purchasing Group
Check which vendors could improve on and examine benchmarking

children.name: Case Details
Invoices with Shorter PT than Vendor Master Data
children.description: This table shows a detailed overview of Invoices, which have shorter Payment Terms than defined in Vendor Master Data

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Company Code",
 "Vendor Number",
  "Vendor Name",
   "Vendor Country",
  "Invoice Number",
  "Fiscal Year",
  "Invoice Amount in $"
  ,"Inv. Accounting Document Date" 
  ,"Inv. Posting Document Date" 
    ,"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key"
    ,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms"
,CASE
WHEN "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" <> "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms"
THEN 'Payment Term Missmatch'
WHEN "Max_Days_Invoice" < "Max_Days_MD" THEN 'Shorter Days in Invoice than in MD'
WHEN "Max_Days_Invoice" > "Max_Days_MD" THEN 'Longer Days in Invoice than in MD'
WHEN "Max_Days_Invoice" = "Max_Days_MD" THEN 'Net Due Dates ok but wrong Payment Term'
ELSE 'Payment Terms are aligned'
END AS "Payment Term Comparison"
--,COUNT(case_id) AS "No. of Invoices with Shorter Payment Terms"
,"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" AS "Terms of Payment Key on Invoice"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms" AS "Terms of Payment Key on Vendor Master"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1"AS "Cash Discount Days 1 on Invoice"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1" AS "Cash Discount Days 1 on Vendor Master Data"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2"AS "Cash Discount Days 2 on Invoice"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" AS "Cash Discount Days 2 on Vendor Master Data"
,"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" AS "Net Payment Terms Period on Invoice"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" AS "Net Payment Terms Period on Vendor Master Data"
   
FROM(
SELECT
	"Inv. Company Code" AS "Company Code",
  "Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number",
  "Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name",
  "Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country",
  "Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number",
  "Inv. Fiscal Year" AS "Fiscal Year",
    "Inv. Accounting Document Date" 
  ,"Inv. Posting Document Date" 
  ,"Inv. Converted USD Amount" AS "Invoice Amount in $"
    ,"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key"
    ,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms" 
,case_id
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2"
,"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD"
,"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms"
,CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" IS NOT NULL THEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
WHEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" IS NULL AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" IS NOT NULL
THEN "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2"
WHEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" IS NULL AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2"IS NULL
THEN "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1"
END AS "Max_Days_Invoice"
, CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NOT NULL THEN "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL AND "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NOT NULL
THEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2"
WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL AND "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL
THEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
END AS "Max_Days_MD"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
) AS "Selection"

WHERE (("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1")
		< "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
   	 	OR 
     	("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" END))
        OR
		("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD" IS NULL THEN 0 
		ELSE "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" END)))	


ORDER BY 8 DESC

children.name: All Cases with Invoice Details
children.description: The table includes all Cases and their details related to the Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT
 case_id AS "Case ID",
  "Inv. Company Code" AS "Company Code",
  "Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number",
  "Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name",
  "Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country",
  "Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number",
  "Inv. Fiscal Year" AS "Fiscal Year",
  "Inv. Converted USD Amount" AS "Invoice Amount in $",
  CASE
    WHEN "Last PO Id" IS NULL THEN 'Non-PO Invoice'
    ELSE 'PO Invoice'
  END AS "PO Category",
  "Inv. Document Type Text" AS "Doc Type",
  CASE WHEN "Inv. Amount Eligible for Cash Discount in Document Currency" <> 0.00 THEN
  'Cash Discount available'
  ELSE 
  'No Cash Discount' END AS "Cash Discount Classification",
  "Inv. Amount Eligible for Cash Discount in Document Currency",
  "Inv. Converted USD Cash Discount Amount" AS "Cash Discount Amount",
  "Last Inv. Item G/L Account Number" AS "G/L Account Number",
  --  all date fields
  "Inv. Date" AS "Invoice Date",
  "Inv. Posting Document Date" AS "Posting Date",
  "Last Inv. Item Clearing Entry Date" AS "Clearing Entry Date",
  "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" AS "Clearing Date",
  "Last Inv. Item Due Date" AS "Net Due Date",
  "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2"
,"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD"

FROM
  "THIS_PROCESS"
  WHERE "Inv. Accounting Document Number" is not null
ORDER BY
  15 DESC
 Limit 10

children.name: Invoice Details
children.description: The table lists all Invoices and their related Details (to export or sort them by colums)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
case_id
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country"
,"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year"
,"Inv. Converted USD Amount" AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,"Inv. Converted USD Amount Eligible for Cash Discount" 
,"Inv. Document Type Text" AS "Doc Type" 
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code" 
,"Last Inv. Item G/L Account Number" AS "G/L Account Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" 
,"Inv. Posting Document Date" AS "Posting Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Entry Date" AS "Clearing Entry Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" AS "Clearing Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" AS "Due Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" AS "Last Cash Discount Days 1"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" AS "Last Cash Discount Days 2"
,"Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key" AS "Current Payment Block"
-- aggregated KPIsm
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Total Cycle Time"
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))) AS "Days fro Since Last Activ"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 10 desc
Limit 10
